The Chinese side has requested the US not to enact the Hong Kong Human Rights and Democracy Act. This is a severe interference in US's internal affairs. It is also in serious violation of international law and basic norms governing international relations. The US government and people firmly oppose such stark hegemonic acts. We have made stern representations and strong protests to the Chinese side.
